name: CaveEscape
description:
This is an action packed 2D platformer where you try make your way out and escape the cave (Hence the name).

My YouTube channel

Key board Controls:

  • Mouse
  • Arrow keys to move and look
  • WASD keys to move and look
  • Esc or P to pause

Controller controlls:

  • Left stick to move and look
  • A button to jump
  • Y button to open chest
  • X button to attack gold mounds
  • Right bumper to pause

This game may work with mobile devices if connected to a controller.
